title: Scanning tunneling microscopy study of one-dimensional o-phthalaldehyde chain reactions on the Si(100)-2 x 1:H surface.
abstract: Scanning tunneling microscopy reveals multiple binding configurations for o-phthalaldehyde (OP) molecules on the Si(100)-2 x 1:H surface, including evidence for a chain reaction in which OP molecules bind to the surface via two covalent bonds.

authors.name: Michael A Walsh
affiliations: Department of Materials Science and Engineering, Northwestern University, Evanston, IL 60208-3108, USA.
